name: Phan Thiet - Mui Ne - Ta Cu  2 days 1 night every Weekend.
description:
Escape from hot weather of the city, drink fresh coconuts while enjoying your full exciting weekend on the beautiful beach in Mui Ne, Phan Thiet.

Visit Museum of pearl, learn about shinning Crafted Genuine Pearls and Gemstones.

Experience with sand-sliding game on yellow sand hills and watch  beautiful sunset.
